mapper.insert: insert into ban (memberId, nickName, mno) values (#{memberId}, #{nickName}, #{mno});
mapper.delete: delete FROM ban where mno = #{mno} and memberId = #{memberId};
mapper.select: select count(*) from ban where mno = #{mno} and memberId = #{memberId};
SELECT count(memberId) FROM MEMBER WHERE mno = (SELECT mno FROM ban WHERE memberId = #{memberId});
